source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video presents a wide shot of a city street at night, captured from a low-angle, forward-facing perspective from inside a moving vehicle. The hood of the car is visible at the bottom of the frame in the foreground. The road, with a central white lane divider, extends from the foreground into the background. In the middle ground, parked cars line both the left and right sides of the street, with dark buildings behind them. As the camera moves forward, the parked cars scroll past the frame. A large "STOP" marking painted on the road surface moves from the middle ground to fill the foreground before the camera proceeds through the intersection. Streetlights are positioned in the middle ground and background, illuminating the scene.
